channel.title: GitHub Trending - Swift (Monthly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Swift nel periodo monthly

item.title: 📝 dinoki-ai/osaurus (874 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: dinoki-ai

📝 Repository: dinoki-ai/osaurus

📄 Descrizione: Native, Apple Silicon–only local LLM server. Similar to Ollama, but built on Apple's MLX for maximum performance on M‑series chips. SwiftUI app + SwiftNIO server with OpenAI‑compatible endpoints.

⭐ Stelle: 874

🍴 Forks: 27

💻 Linguaggio: Swift

🏷️ Topics: llm swift
